classes.js - Fis3 Code

Global variables defined

  • trim
  • whitespace

Functions defined

  • add
  • classes
  • contains
  • remove
  • set

Source code

  1. 'use strict';

  3. ‌var trim = /^\s+|\s+$/g;
  4. ‌var whitespace = /\s+/;

  6. ‌function classes (node) {
  7.   return node.className.replace(trim, '').split(whitespace);
  8. }

  10. ‌function set (node, value) {
  11.   node.className = value.join(' ');
  12. }

  14. ‌function add (node, value) {
  15.   var values = remove(node, value);
  16.   values.push(value);
  17.   set(node, values);
  18. }

  20. ‌function remove (node, value) {
  21.   var values = classes(node);
  22.   var i = values.indexOf(value);
  23.   if (i !== -1) {
  24.     values.splice(i, 1);
  25.     set(node, values);
  26.   }
  27.   return values;
  28. }

  30. ‌function contains (node, value) {
  31.   return classes(node).indexOf(value) !== -1;
  32. }

  34. module.exports = {
  35.   add: add,
  36.   remove: remove,
  37.   contains: contains
  38. };
